main event: A visual observation of an object described as somewhat comet-like with a blue cast occurred in Wagoner, Oklahoma on 28 Oct 55.
interesting points: The observation was classified under the military source., The object was reported as having a blue cast., The sighting is likely classified as a meteor observation., The document originates from Project Blue Book, which investigated UFO sightings in the 1950s., The exact duration and length of the observation were not recorded.
